channel.title: Vote Help
channel.description: Hi i made a vote thing on my site where when you go on it asks you to vote and it keeps asking them over and over each time they enter the site and i was wondering how i would make it so it did it once every day.

item.title: Vote Help

item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

Hi i made a vote thing on my site where when you go on it asks you to vote and it keeps asking them over and over each time they enter the site and i was wondering how i would make it so it did it once every day.

Read full topic
